Class firebaseDBController

java.lang.Object
firebaseDBController
public class firebaseDBController extends Object
fireBaseDBController class that can be called to get the specific instance of the firestore database the constructor takes in the uID to find specific user data

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    firebaseDBController(String uId)
    Parameters contructor to take in the uId of a specific user

      public void loadData(javafx.scene.control.TableView<MealEntry> tblViw)

    • loadProfileData

      public void loadProfileData(javafx.scene.control.Label names, javafx.scene.control.Label goal)
      public method to loadProfileData when the profile screen is accessed
      Parameters:
      names - first/last name label passed in for update after data is retrieved from the db
      goal - goal weight label passed in for update after data is retrieve from the db
